accountForm.title: Website already exists
accountForm.body:
This website has already been added to an existing account:
{{account}}
Are you sure you want to use:
{{website}}

delete.confirmTextTwo: You won't be able to revert this!
delete.errorText:
There was an error processing your request.
Please try again.

assignTo.title: Assign this {{type}}
assignTo.questionText: Do you want to assign this {{type}} to yourself?

deactivateUser.confirmText: Are you sure you want to deactivate {{name}}

resendUserInvite.title: Resend invite
resendUserInvite.confirmText: Are you sure you want to resend the invite to {{email}}

removeUserInvite.confirmText: Are you sure you want to delete the invite for {{name}}

cases.noSelectionText: Please select an account or contact the deal belongs to.
cases.noAssigneeText: Please select a colleague or team to assign the case to.

email.overwriteTemplateConfirm: Selecting a different template will reload the template. This will put your typed text at the bottom of the email. Do you want to load the template anyway?
email.reloadTemplateConfirm: Do you want to reload the template? This will load the template variables, but will put your already typed text at the bottom of the email.

notificationPermission.title: Heads up!
notificationPermission.text: Browser permission is needed to send notifications for the call integration. Please allow these notifications to make complete use of the call integration.

subscription.cancelText: You are about to cancel your plan. This will downgrade your Lily environment back to the Personal Plan after the next billing date. Any colleagues also using this environment will also be downgraded. This means that you will no longer have access to paid features. Are you sure you want to continue?
subscription.trialStartText: Are you sure you want to start your professional plan 30 day trial period?

disable.confirmText: You are about to disable two factor authentication. This lowers your account security. Are you sure you want to continue?

removeBackupPhoneNumber.title: Are you sure?
removeBackupPhoneNumber.html: This means you will no longer be able to log in using this phone number.

error.title: Error
error.text: There was an error processing your request.

endSession.title: Are you sure?
endSession.html: This means that you will be logged out from this device.

error.title: Error
error.text: There was an error processing your request.

widgetSettings: Check or uncheck a box to change which widgets are visible in the dashboard.
timeLogZeroError: Please enter a value greater than 0
